title: ceNDanADuta
sahitya:
ceNDanADuta banda puNda krSNanu tanna hiNDu gOpAlakara koNDu yamuneya taDige


caraNam 1    ore turubane kaTTi gIru nAmavaniTTu hAra kankaNa tOLabandi ghungura ghana 
sAra kumkuma kEsari gandha carcisi sErisuta naDuvige kAsidaTTiyanuTTu 
hArADutali banda toDaragAla tOra cinmaNigaLinda muttina ceNDu 
dhariNige puTisi ninda vajrada ghaNi tOri keLeyara kUDa bandarA maneyinda
    caraNam 2    koNDAla nimmanu ceNDene hoDedanu miNDeyara molegAgi hAri haridu biLe 
hiNDu nAriyarella sutti koNDire avara maNDige tagulisi purada bAgila biTTu 
kaNDiyindali bandanu nAriyara maNDEge ceNDiTTanu tOrisuvara 
kaNDu tA nagutiddanu keLatukavendu diNDeyaru maDuvinoLage hAki naDedaru
    caraNam 3    geLeyarellaru kUDi ceNDu tA enalAgi guLu guLisuva viSada yamunAdaDiyali nindu 
baLiya vrSada mElEri tA dhumukalu kaLakaLisuva gOpAlaraLutalire 
iLida nIroLagAgalu nAgara phaNi tuLidu kuNi kuNiyutiralu brahmanu bandu 
tiLidu maddale hoyyalu inrAdyaru nalidu tALavaniTTu koNDADutiddaru
    caraNam 4    magana suddiya kELi haridu bandaLu gOpi nagarada horagAgi bAya nAdadinda 
vigaDeyaru biTTa maNDeya junju kedaruta tegedu maNNane tUri kuLitallindale 
nammannagali hOguvare hIge ranga namma mogava nODuvudendige nODada kaNNa
tegedu kILuvenindige paDeda poTTe dagadagisalu koTTu muniyade bA bEga
    caraNam 5    Enembenu krSNa ninna kANade purada mAniniyaru beragAgi pILuta karuva 
kANadirettige karuvanu biDuvaru A nAsikada mUgudi kivigiDuvaru 
dhEnu mevane toreduvu gOvugaLanya rAmanegODiduvu vatsagaLella 
maunadi mEle toreduvu krSNayyana vENunAdada dhvani kELade meccavu
    caraNam 6    dvArake krSNa nI bAyendu kareveno tOruva samapAda viTTalanembeno 
shrI ramaNa vEnkaTanendu odaruveno shrI ranga shayanendenallade ninna 
cOra jAranendene haddina mEle Eri tiruguvanendane beNNeya kaddu 
sure mADuvanendane krSNayya nI bArayya bAradiddare prANa nIguve
    caraNam 7    kaNNetti nODidanendene kaDegOla bennali piDidanendane hAlgaLanUri 
maNNa kaccalu bAya tereyuvanendene maNNa bEDalu nA koDalArenendene 
enna kuttige koivare mAteya mAtu mannisi vanake pOpare balabhadra 
aNNanige mukhava tOre krSNayya nI saNNavanennade hariya koNDADide
    caraNam 8    endamAtanu kELuvA samaya nAgiNi vrandavellavu tamma kanTha bhUSaNarAgi 
andada mEluda sutti koNDire aravinda nAbhAcyuta kEshava murahara 
mandaradhara hariye ninage nAvu mandAkiniya sariye mAngalyada 
cenda kAyai doreya hariya krpeyinda karedu namma kAya bEkendaru
    caraNam 9    indindu stavanava mADe kALingana kAnteyara stOtrake mecci nAgana biTTu kantuka sahita 
pankajanALavane koNDu santasadali ikkuda shOkadi nIvu bhrAnti biDiri ennuta baride ella sante 
kUDide ennuta nA hasidenu panti bhOjana koNDu naDeyiri manegenda
  caraNam 10    surarige sudhe munce uNisida parabrahma paripari bhOjana mALpa kaNDavarAru sura dundubi 
poDedu pArijAtada maLe surasidArAkSaNake brahmanu tAnu teraLidanAshramake purandara viTTala
tirugida nijadhAmake krSNana lIle kurudayeyali namma hariya koNDADide
